channel.title: Need some help please ( i r noob lol )
channel.description: I've just downloaded the client and source for dspk and i think its 508 or 525 not sure but i've changed the ip in the client but i cant seem to find the ip in the source can anyone help me please i just want to get it on so me and my friend can play thanks

item.title: Need some help please ( i r noob lol )
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

utorrent always blocks port 43594, i know because i use it all the time. and i figure u know how to fix, but this is how:
1st. Open utorrent and go in your preferences.
2. under connections, change the port from 43594 to any umber and hit apply.
3. run your server with that number. your server should “run” but no one can log in.
4. go back to the connections section of utorrent and change the port back to 43594, apply and close utorrent if you want.
5. go to your server cmd, close it, and open it again.
Good job your done

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help please ( i r noob lol )

item.title: Need some help please ( i r noob lol )
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

It’s a 317.
The IP can be found in your source at server.java
Seachr for “Listening from”:

Then you will find dspk ip or 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1
Whatever is there.
